description: This file defines the MemoryClassifier class, which is a machine learning component for classifying user messages based on their importance for future memory. It includes methods for updating the model, generating system messages, and running classification synchronously and asynchronously.

classes.name: MemoryClassifier
classes.description: A class for classifying user messages to determine if they contain information worth remembering for future conversations.

methods.name: update_model
methods.description: Initializes the model if it is not already set, attempting to import and instantiate OpenAIChat.

methods.name: get_system_message
methods.description: Constructs and returns a system message guiding the classifier's decision process, including existing memories if any.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Synchronously processes a message to classify it, updating the model if necessary, and returns the classification response.

methods.name: arun
methods.description: Asynchronously processes a message to classify it, updating the model if necessary, and returns the classification response.
